info_errors.title: 301 Moved Permanently
info_errors.text: The requested page has been permanently moved to a new location.

info_errors.title: 400 Bad Request
info_errors.text: The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.

info_errors.title: 403 Forbidden
info_errors.text: The request is valid, but the server refuses to authorize it.

info_errors.title: 404 Not Found
info_errors.text: The requested resource could not be found.

info_errors.title: 405 Method Not Allowed
info_errors.text: The requested method is not allowed for the specified resource.

info_errors.title: 408 Request Timeout
info_errors.text: The server timed out waiting for the request.

info_errors.title: 500 Internal Server Error
info_errors.text: An unexpected condition was encountered on the server.

info_errors.title: 503 Service Unavailable
info_errors.text: The server is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or overload.
